Package dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.blockchain

Class Block

java.lang.Object
dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.blockchain.Block
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Block>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DSDBlock, SimpleBlock
public abstract class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Block>
Basic class for creating a block structure for blockchains Already contains its hash and nonce value as well as immutable timestamp and the hash of the previous block
